item.title: A struggle note after a machine learning amateur who changed jobs to a non-IT company was assigned to an AI project
item.description: #Introduction This article is the 8th day of How I learned machine learning by Nikkei xTECH Business AI â‘¡ Advent Calendar 2019. We hope that it will be helpful for those who are new to the market. Programming experience School days (robot engineering, fluid mechanics): :new: C/C++; embedded, computational fluid dynamics, research tools :new: Matlab; A little in modern control theory Previous job (ADAS): C/C++; embedded, in-house tool :new: Python; Algorithm prototyping and data organization *Not related to AI Current position (construction and civil engineering construction management): C++; built-in Python; Machine Learning/Deep Learning :new: JavaScript (Node.
